[[Obito|Tobi]] [[Kamui|teleports]] behind the opponent and prepares to throw a bomb, only to accidentally drop it at his feet. As he quickly makes a run for it, the bomb detonates, creating a huge explosion.

[[pl:Michinaru Nōryoku]]
